scripts.apply:dev:all: yarn run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never --all --app 'npx ts-node bin/dev/all.ts' --path-metadata false
scripts.apply:dev:functions: yarn run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never -e 'reamplify-dev-AppSyncFunctions' --app 'npx ts-node bin/dev/all.ts' --path-metadata false
scripts.apply:dev:bootstrap: yarn run build && cdk deploy --all --app 'npx ts-node bin/dev/bootstrap.ts' --path-metadata false
scripts.apply:dev:ci: yarn run build && cdk deploy --all --app 'npx ts-node bin/dev/ci.ts' --path-metadata false
scripts.apply:homepage:bootstrap: yarn run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never --all --app 'npx ts-node bin/homepage/bootstrap.ts' --path-metadata false
scripts.apply:homepage:ci: yarn run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never --all --app 'npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/homepage/ci.ts' --path-metadata false
scripts.plan:dev: yarn run build && cdk diff --app 'npx ts-node bin/dev/all.ts' --path-metadata false
scripts.plan:bootstrap:dev: yarn run build && cdk diff --app 'npx ts-node bin/dev/bootstrap.ts' --path-metadata false
scripts.synth:dev: yarn run build && cdk synth --app 'npx ts-node bin/dev/ci.ts' --path-metadata false
scripts.destroy:dev: yarn run build && cdk destroy --app 'npx ts-node bin/dev/all.ts' --all --path-metadata false --outputs-file stack.json
scripts.destroy:ci:dev: yarn run build && cdk destroy --app 'npx ts-node bin/dev/ci.ts' --all --path-metadata false --outputs-file stack.json
